definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Effect of atmospheric stability on DCR and DTS was nonlinear.
sentences.chinese: DCR和DTS大气稳定度的影响是非线性的。

sentences.english: Integrates a next-generation ICMS to ensure stability during loading and gameplay.
sentences.chinese: 整合次世代的ICMS保证游戏稳定度。

sentences.english: The problem of short term frequency stability is one of the key-link techniques in Doppler-velocity measurement.
sentences.chinese: 频率短期稳定度问题是多普勒测速关键技术之一。

sentences.english: A frequency meter in high stability is reported.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种高稳定度频率计。

sentences.english: Cumulus heating can also modify the static stability.
sentences.chinese: 积云加热还起到修正静力稳定度的作用。

sentences.english: And the relationship of the oasis cold island and the stratification stability of the background field has been analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 并且分析了背景场层结稳定度与冷岛的关系。

sentences.english: The selection of measurement bandwidth in time domain frequency stability is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了频率稳定度时域测量带宽如何选择的问题。

sentences.english: Mr. Uchida also said that HAL's stability and speed were pretty good.
sentences.chinese: 内田先生也表示，HAL的稳定度和速度都相当不错。

sentences.english: Maintaining the stability of spine relies on proper muscle activations and spinal column function.
sentences.chinese: 维持脊椎稳定度必须依赖正常的肌肉和椎体的功能。

sentences.english: Mineral stability can depend upon the amount by which the soil is oxygenated.
sentences.chinese: 矿物的稳定度可由土壤中氧化的程度所决定。

pinyin: jie1 shou1 qi4 ling2 min3 du4
